arm_group.description: Ropicacain 3,75 mg/ml 15 ml x 4 when placing the Bilateral Dual Transverus Abdominis Plane block
Isotonic potassium chloride 15 ml x 4 when placing the bilateral dual transverus abdominis plane block.

brief_summary.textblock:
To evaluate the effects of bilateral dual transversus abdominis plane block on postoperative
      pain after robotic assited laparoskopic surgery and measure the plasma-level of ropivacain
      after the bilateral dual transversus abdominis plane block.

clinical_study.brief_title: Bilateral Dual Transversus Abdominis Plane Block for Robotic Assisted Laparoscopic Surgery
condition: Bilateral Dual Transversus Abdominis Plane Block

detailed_description.textblock:
After randomisation patients for robotic assisted laparoscopic surgery will receive
      bilateral dual transversus abdominis plane block containing either ropivacain or isotonic
      potassium chloride.

      The investigators will record pain-score, opioid-consumption and sensibility on the
      abdominal wall in the postoperative periode.

      Also a blood sample will be taken at 15, 30, 60, 120 and 240 minutes after the block in
      order to measure the plasma-level of ropivacain after bilateral dual transversus abdominis
      plane block.

      The investigators assume that there will be significant effect on postoperative pain and
      that the level of plasma-ropivacain will be acceptable.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  patients scheduled for robotic assisted laparoscopis surgery

          -  acceptance to participate

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  allergies to local analgetics

          -  daily use of strong opioids

intervention.description: Ropicacain 3,75 mg/ml 15 ml x 4 when placing the Bilateral Dual Transverus Abdominis Plane block
Isotonic potassium chloride 15 ml x 4 when placing the bilateral dual transverus abdominis plane block.

clinical_study.official_title: A Randomised, Double-blind Study to Evaluate the Effect of Bilateral Dual Transversus Abdominis Plane Block on Postoperative Pain and Plasma Concentration of Ropivacaine After Robotic Assisted Laparoscopic Surgery

other_outcome.time_frame: 1 hour after bilateral dual transversus abdominis plane block

authority: Denmark: The Danish National Committee on Biomedical Research Ethics

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Double Blind (Subject, Caregiver, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor), Primary Purpose: Treatment
